channel.title: keyboards on (´_ゝ`) the gooberverse
channel.description: Recent content in keyboards on (´_ゝ`) the gooberverse

item.title: the realforce r2 keyboard
item.description: the current keyboard i use is the Realforce R2 Tenkeyless in the ivory colorway. in the beginning of my keyboard journey, i started with a Leopold FC750R. also a tenkeyless, but with mechanical switches instead of Topre switches. i originally purchased it after hearing about the Leopold FC660C, and being confused as to why it was so expensive, but still wanting the Leopold name behind my typing instrument of choice.

item.title: the realforce r2 keyboard
item.description: the current keyboard i use is the Realforce R2 Tenkeyless in the ivory colorway. in the beginning of my keyboard journey, i started with a Leopold FC750R. also a tenkeyless, but with mechanical switches instead of Topre switches. i originally purchased it after hearing about the Leopold FC660C, and being confused as to why it was so expensive, but still wanting the Leopold name behind my typing instrument of choice.
